messages: I see that Takiyasha has brought another skeleton to life.  I am Melquiades the werewolf.
While you fight the villagers, I explore nearby realms for accessories to sell you.
Each night, I'll try to have a new weapon to give you, along with upgrades you can purchase.
Since you woke up in the middle of last night, I was unable to find a new weapon for you.  Instead, I have a sword that you can have.
Last night, I was able to find two new weapons: a shotgun and a sniper. Both are valid choices, but I can only give you one for free.
Also, be sure to check out the upgrades I was able to find.
Welcome back. Today I can give you either a minigun or a bazooka. If you desire both, feel free to buy the other.
Ah, I see you are still alive.  Most skeletons cannot make it this far.  Unfortunately, I could not find any new weapons for you last night.
As such, I am reselling some weapons from the previous couple nights.  Hopefully you can find them of good use.
